body_content.explanation: seen from the point of view of England or English people; considering England or English people to be the most important:
examples: For a less Anglocentric view you can always watch Eurosport.

body_content.explanation: considering the English language or English-speaking culture to be the most important; expecting everything to be written or spoken in English:
examples: He admits the literary festival has been Anglocentric in its choice of writers in the past.
the anglocentric hegemony in science writing
